metadata.source: (1) the ed. by Ernst Waldschmidt. In: Bruchstücke buddhistischer Sūtras aus dem zentralasiatischen Sanskritkanon I, Leipzig 1932 (Kleinere Sanskrit-Texte, 4; Nachdruck: Monographien zur indischen Archäologie, Kunst und Philologie, 2. Wiesbaden, Stuttgart 1979), pp. 207-225; and Ernst Waldschmidt, "Ein zweites Daśabalasūtra", Mitteilungen des Instituts für Orientforschung 6 (1958), pp. 382-387, 397-403 [Nachdruck: Ernst Waldschmidt. Von Ceylon bis Turfan, Schriften zur Geschichte, Literatur, Religion und Kunst des indischen Kulturraumes (Festgabe zum 70. Geburtstag). Göttingen 1967, pp. 347-352, 362-368]. (2) on the ed. by Ernst Waldschmidt: "Ein zweites Daśabalasūtra", Mitteilungen des Instituts für Orientforschung 6 (1958), pp. 388_392, 395f. [Nachdruck: Ernst Waldschmidt. Von Ceylon bis Turfan, Schriften zur Geschichte, Literatur, Religion und Kunst des indischen Kulturraumes (Festgabe zum 70. Geburtstag), Göttingen 1967, pp. 353-357, 360-361]. (3) on the edition by Jin-il Chung. "Ein drittes und ein viertes Daśabala-Sūtra", Sanko Bunka Kenkyūjo Nenpo (Annual of the Sanko Research Institute for the Studies of Buddhism), 40 (2009), pp. 1-32 [4-16]. (4) on the edition by Jin-il Chung: "Ein drittes und ein viertes Daśabala-Sūtra", Sanko Bunka Kenkyūjo Nenpo (Annual of the Sanko Research Institute for the Studies of Buddhism), 40 (2009), pp. 1-32 [17-29].

children.text: thāgatasya balāni yaiḥ samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ā
sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ na
DbSū(1) 1. iha tathāgataḥ sthānañ ca sthānato yathābh
yat tathāgataḥ sthānañ ca sthānato yath
idaṃ prathamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samya
DbSū(1) 4. punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ parasatvānām indriyaparā
idaṃ caturthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena pūrvavad yāvat* pari
DbSū(1) 5. punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ parasatvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ nānādhimuktitāṃ yathābhūtaṃ p
idaṃ pañcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati /
DbSū(1) 6. punar aparaṃ tathāgato nānādhātukaṃ lokam anekadhātukam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / {

fehlt S 481 Z. 11 bzw. 13}
yat tathāgato nānādhātukaṃ lokam anekadhātukam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / {
idaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati /

DbSū(1) 7. punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
yat tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
idaṃ saptamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati /

DbSū(1) 8. punar aparaṃ tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati tadyathaikām api jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau navo daśa viṃśat triṃśac catvāriṃśat pañcāśaj jātiśataṃ jātisahasraṃ jātiśatasahasram anekāny api jātiśatāny anekāny api jātisahasrāṇy anekāny api jātiśatasahasrāṇi saṃvartakalpam api vivartakalpam api saṃvartavivartakalpam apy anekān api saṃvartakalpān anekān api vivartakalpān anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpān samanusmaraty amī nāma te bhavantaḥ satvā yatrāham āsam evaṃnāmaivaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhara evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedy evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāc cyuto 'mutropapannas tasmāc cyuto 'mutropapannas tasmād api cyuta ihopapannaḥ / iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati /
yat tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati tadyathaikām api jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau navo daśa viṃśat triṃśac catvāriṃśat pañcāśaj jātiśataṃ jātisahasraṃ jātiśatasahasram anekāny api jātiśatāny api jātisahasrāṇy anekāny api jātiśatasahasrāṇi saṃvartakalpam api vivartakalpam api saṃvartavivartakalpam apy anekān api saṃvartakalpān anekān api vivartakalpān anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpān samanusmaraty amī nāma te bhavantaḥ satvā yatrāham āsam evaṃnāmaivaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhara evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedy evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāc cyuto 'mutropapannas tasmād api cyuta ihopapannaḥ / iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati /
idam aṣṭamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati /

DbSū(1) 9. punar aparaṃ tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati cyavamānān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān api durvarṇān api hīnān api praṇītān api sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / itīme bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante / ime vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /
yat tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati cyavamānān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān api durvarṇān api hīnān api praṇītān api sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / itīme bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante / ime vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kā
ktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpa
dya pravedayati kṣīṇā me jātir u
ṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhāvaṃ prajānāmi
nāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣī
me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhāvaṃ
āptamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandam* //

rvaiśāradyaprāpta udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati /
DbSū(2) 3 yad utās

idam utpadyate / yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvat samudayo nirodhaś ca bhavati /
DbSū(2) 4 svākhyāto me bhikṣavo dharma utt
DbSū(2) 5 evaṃ svākhyāte me dharme uttāne vivṛte chinnaplotike yāvad devamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksuprakāś

alam eva śraddhāpravrajitena kulaputreṇa yogāya / alam apramādāya / alaṃ śāstuś śāsane yogam āpattuṃ / kāmaṃ tvak snāyu ca asthi cāvatiṣṭhatu pariśuṣyatu śarīrāṃ māṃsaśoṇitam* /
DbSū(2) 6 atha ca punar yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṃ sthāmavatā vīryavatā utsāhinā dhṛḍhaparākrameṇa anikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu
khaṃ kusīto viharati vyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakair akuśa
ḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair duḥkhavipākair āyatyāṃ jātijarā

y arthasya pārihāṇir bhavati /
DbSū(2) 8 ārabdhavīryas tu sukh
āmaraṇīyair mahataś cāpy arthasya pāripūrir bhavati /
DbSū(2) 9 maṇḍapeyam idaṃ pravacanaṃ / yad uta śāstā ca saṃmukhībhūto dha

veditaḥ /
DbSū(2) 10 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ātmārthaṃ ca samanupaśyadbhi
phalā sukhodayā sukhavipākā yeṣāṃ ca paribhokṣyā
mahānuśaṃsā mahādyutayo mahāvaistārā ity evaṃ vo bhikṣa

bhikṣavo nirvide virāgān nirodhād anupādāya vimokṣāt tathāgato 'rhāṃ samyaksaṃbuddha ity ucyate /
DbSū(3) 2b ev

nāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya vācyam*
DbSū(3) 3a bhikṣur api rūpasya nirvide virāgāṃ nirodhād anupādāya vimokṣād arhāṃ prajñāvimukta ity ucyate
DbSū(3) 3b evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya vācyam*
DbSū(3) 4 iha bhikṣavaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ ko 'bhiprāya

karaṇaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya arhatā ca prajñāvimuktena bhikṣuṇā :
DbSū(3) 5 bhagavanmūlakā bhadanta dharmā bhagavaṃnetryā bhagavatpratisaraṇāḥ sādhu bhagavān etam evārthaṃ bhikṣubhyo bhāṣeta bhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavo dhārayiṣyanti
DbSū(3) 6 tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye
DbSū(3) 7 tathāgato bhikṣavaḥ arhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu svayaṃ dhar

bhijñāya dharmāṃ parijñāya dṛṣṭadharmābhijñaḥ paramabodhim anuprāpta āyatyām bodhāya śrāvakānān dharman deśayati /
DbSū(3) 8 yad uta

riyāṇi paṃca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ
DbSū(3) 9 iti hi bhikṣavas tathāgato 'rhāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ anadhiga
rgasyādhigantā aprajñaptasya brahmacaryasya prajñaptā mārgajñas tathāgato mārgavin mārgadaiśikaḥ mārgākhyātā mārgapar

yakaḥ
DbSū(3) 10 tataḥ paścāt samanvāgatāḥ śrāvakā mārgānugāś śāstuḥ śāsa

bhavanty ārādhayanti nyāyaṃ dharmaṃ kuśalam*
DbSū(3) 11 ayaṃ bhi

o viśeṣaḥ ayam abhiprāyaḥ idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya arhatā ca prajñāvimuktena bhikṣuṇā
DbSū(3) 12 pañcemāni śaikṣabalāni daśa

thāgatabalāni /
DbSū(3) 13 paṃca śaikṣabalāni katamāni pañca śraddhābalaṃ śaikṣabalam* vīryabalaṃ hrībalam avatrāpyabalaṃ prajñā

lam*
DbSū(3) 14 daśa tathāgatabalāni katamāni daśa
DbSū(3) 15.1a iha tathāgataḥ sthānañ ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti a

nañ cāsthānataḥ
DbSū(3) 15.1b yat tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti asthānañ cāsthānataḥ idaṃ prathamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi

dati /
DbSū(3) 15.2a punar aparaṃ tathāgato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannāni karmadharmasamādānāni sthāna

taś ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
DbSū(3) 15.2b yat tathāgato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannāni karmadharmas
mādānāni sthānato hetuto vastuto vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti idaṃ dvitīyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena bale

*
DbSū(3) 15.3a punar aparaṃ tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānavyavasthānaviśuddhin yathā

āti
DbSū(3) 15.3b yat tathāgato yāvad idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tathāgat

lena pūrvavat*
DbSū(3) 15.4a punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ parasatvānām indriy

parāvaratāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
DbSū(3) 15.4b yat tathāgataḥ parasatvānāṃ yāvad idaṃ caturthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena

vat*
DbSū(3) 15.5a punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ parasatvānāṃ nānādhimuktitāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
DbSū(3) 15.5b yat tathāgataḥ pa

prajānāti idaṃ pañcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ pūrvavat*
DbSū(3) 15.6a punar aparaṃ ta

m anekadhātukaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
DbSū(3) 15.6b yat tathāgato nānādhātukaṃ lokam anekadhātukaṃ yath

jānāti idaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ pūrvavat*
DbSū(3) 15.7a punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānā

thāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti idaṃ saptamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ pūrvavat*
DbSū(3) 15.8a punar aparaṃ ta

ta anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati tadyathā ekām api jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśa viṃśat triṃśac catvāriṃśat pañcāśaj jātiśataṃ jātisahasraṃ jātiśatasahasram anekāny api jātiśatasahasrāṇi saṃ
rtakalpāṃ vivartakalpāṃ anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpāṃ samanusmarati amī nāma te satvā abhūvaṃ yatr
ham āsam evaṃnāma evaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhāraḥ evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃdīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitika eva
ryantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāc cyutaḥ amutropapannas tasmād api cyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyutaḥ ihopapanna iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ sodde

m anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati
DbSū(3) 15.8b yat tathāgataḥ anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati tadyathā ekām api jātiṃ dve tisraḥ pūrvavad idam aṣṭamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena pūrvavat*
DbSū(3) 15.9a punar aparaṃ tath

gato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati cyavamānān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān api durvarṇān api hīnān api praṇītān api sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ yathā
jānāti itīme bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām a
ṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apā
pātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyaṃte / ime vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucari
vimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svaya
yati kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bh

tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena pūrvavat*
DbSū(3) 16 (Skt. no parallel)
DbSū(3) 17 idam a
vocad bhagavān āptamanasas te bhikṣavo bha

DbSū(4) 1 (Skt. not extant; cf. Sūtra 684, §1)
DbSū(4) 2a (Skt. not extant)
DbSū(4) 2b (Skt. not extant)
DbSū(4) 2c (Skt. not extant)
DbSū(4) 3 (Skt. not extant; cf. Sūtra 684, § 12)
DbSū(4) 4 (Skt. not extant; cf. Sūtra 684, § 13)
DbSū(4) 5.1 (Skt. not extant; cf. Sūtra 684, § 15.1a)
DbSū(4) 5.2-7 (Skt. not extant; cf. Sūtra 684, § 15.2-7)
DbSū(4) 5.8a (Skt. not extant; cf. Sūtra 684, § 15.8a)
DbSū(4) 5.8b
nusmarati / idam aṣṭamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgatas tathā
ksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ vartayati pariṣadi s

i /
DbSū(4) 5.9a punar aparaṃ tathāgato divyena cakṣ
ṇān api durvarṇān api hīnān api pr
durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / itīme bhavaṃta
tos taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svarg
iśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvāṃ paśyati cyavamānān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān
n api praṇītān api sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagāṃ satvāṃ ya
āti / itīme bhavaṃtaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena sa
na samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikar
ṣūpapadyaṃte / idaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ yena balena samanvāgat

riṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadati /
DbSū(4) 5.10a punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anā
tovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam
āparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi / idaṃ daśamaṃ

nādaṃ nadati /
DbSū(4) 6.1 taṃ cainaṃ tathāg
vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā tat tathāgataḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo
tena karmasvakajñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā t

ṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāt*
DbSū(4) 6.4 taṃ cainaṃ

o vyākuryāt*
DbSū(4) 6.6 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ nānādhātujñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat tath

ṭo vyākuryāt*
DbSū(4) 6.7 taṃ cainaṃ tathāgataṃ sarvatragāminīpratip
bale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat tathāgat
jñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā tat tathāgataḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryā
jñānabale praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ yathā tat tathā
yajñānabalaṃ jñātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ viditaṃ vijñātaṃ samyag evābhisaṃbuddhaṃ tathā

sya /
DbSū(4) 7.2 karmasvakajñānabalam iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadā
am iti bhikṣavaḥ samāhitasya vadāmi nāsamāhitasya /
